name: Split Masters
description:
Finding balance is not easy! Do you have what it takes to become a true Split Master?

Warning!!! This game is unlike any other. Its original gameplay will challenge your self-control and test your inner strength. Take control of one of the Split Masters and try to climb as high as possible while making a split.

DO NOT FALL!!!

How far can you climb?

- Unlock new characters
- Addictive one tap gameplay
- Challenge your friends for the high score
- Be the best in global rankings

Are you the next Split Master? Let the world know about it!

Psssh... Watch your head. ;)
